name: Scraper Source Decision
details: Session plan: Analyze llms.txt vs llms-full.txt sources, decide on optimal directory structure and filenaming for scraper output.

tasks.name: Analyze Sources
tasks.details: Compare llms.txt vs llms-full.txt formats and trade-offs

tasks.name: Evaluate Structure
tasks.details: Review current flat underscore structure vs hierarchical options

tasks.name: Discuss Decisions
tasks.details: Present findings and get janbam's input on source selection and directory structure
